price: да - по Његовом наређењу - позиваш к Аллаху, и као светиљку која сија.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
